description: This file defines a Data Access Object (DAO) interface for accessing Note data within a Room database in an Android application. It declares methods for retrieving all notes, fetching a note by its ID, searching notes by query, inserting notes, and deleting notes.

classes.name: NoteDao
classes.description: A Room DAO interface providing methods to perform database operations related to 'Note' entities.

methods.name: getAllNotes
methods.description: Asynchronously retrieves all notes ordered by timestamp descending.

methods.name: getNoteById
methods.description: Asynchronously retrieves a single Note by its ID.

methods.name: searchNotes
methods.description: Asynchronously searches for notes where the title or content matches the query, ordered by timestamp descending.

methods.name: insert
methods.description: Inserts a Note into the database, replacing any existing record with the same primary key.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes the specified Note from the database.
